SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.composer.impl

Class EncoderEngine.OutputAggregate

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.composer.impl.EncoderEngine.OutputAggregate
Enclosing class:
EncoderEngine
protected class EncoderEngine.OutputAggregate extends Object
Rewrite multiple profiles to ffmpeg complex filter filtergraph chains - inputs are passed in as options, eq: [0aa] and [0vv] Any filters in the encoding profiles are moved into a clause in the complex filter chain for each output

    Description
    String
    adjustABRVMaps(String option, int position)
    When the inputs are routed to ABR, some options need to have a v:int suffix for video and a:0 for audio Any options ending with ":v" will get a number, otherwise try and guess use option:(v or a) notables (eg: b:v, c:v), options such as ab or vb will not work
    String

      public String adjustForNoComplexFilter(String pad)
      If this is a raw mapping not used with complex filter, strip the square brackets if there are any
      Parameters:
      pad - - such as 0:a, [0:v], [1:1],[0:12],[main],[overlay]
      Returns:

    • processParameters

    • outputAggregateReal

      public void outputAggregateReal(List<org.opencastproject.composer.api.EncodingProfile> profiles, org.opencastproject.composer.api.EncodingProfile groupProfile, Map<String,String> params, String vInputPad, String aInputPad) throws org.opencastproject.composer.api.EncoderException
      Translate the profiles to work with complex filter clauses in ffmpeg, it splits one output into multiple, one for each encoding profile. This also generates the manifests for HLS using the group profile (HLS only). Each encoding profile must have a bitrate or one will be generated for all the profiles. This requires ffmpeg version later than 4.1
      Parameters:
      profiles - - list of encoding profiles
      groupProfile - - encoding profile that applies to all output and has precedence, currently only HLS options
      params - - values for substitution
      vInputPad - - name of video pad as input, eg: [0v] null if no video
      aInputPad - - name of audio pad as input, eg [0a], null if no audio
      Throws:
      org.opencastproject.composer.api.EncoderException - - if it fails

    • adjustABRVMaps

      public String adjustABRVMaps(String option, int position)
      When the inputs are routed to ABR, some options need to have a v:int suffix for video and a:0 for audio Any options ending with ":v" will get a number, otherwise try and guess use option:(v or a) notables (eg: b:v, c:v), options such as ab or vb will not work
      Parameters:
      option - - ffmpeg option
      position - - position in the command

    • outputAggregateReal

      public void outputAggregateReal(List<org.opencastproject.composer.api.EncodingProfile> profiles, Map<String,String> params, String vInputPad, String aInputPad) throws org.opencastproject.composer.api.EncoderException
      Translate the profiles to work with complex filter clauses in ffmpeg, it splits one output into multiple, one for each encoding profile
      Parameters:
      profiles - - list of encoding profiles
      params - - values for substitution
      vInputPad - - name of video pad as input, eg: [0v] null if no video
      aInputPad - - name of audio pad as input, eg [0a], null if no audio
      Throws:
      org.opencastproject.composer.api.EncoderException - - if it fails
